charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] entered a clearing
in the forest and heard Rosa’s voice nearby.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_0200_10: “All right! I’ll show you how it’s done!”
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_0300_10:
“Why? ’Cause I’m the most powerful Trainer
in the world! That’s why!”
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0401_0500_10:
Oh! Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Was my imitation pretty close? Tee-hee!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0401_0600_10:
You guessed correctly! I was trying
to do Blue’s voice.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0402_0800_10:
Oh! Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Tee-hee! Guess I’ve been discovered.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0402_0900_10:
I was trying to imitate Blue’s voice,
but it’s pretty hard!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_1000_10:
See, Snivy and I have been practicing
our acting skills!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_1100_10:
Not many people know this, but I actually
did some movie acting for a little while
back in the Unova region.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_1600_10:
In Unova, there’s this awesome place called
Pokéstar Studios where movies are made.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_1700_10:
And Snivy and I acted together in
some of the movies produced there.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2200_10: If you ever visit the Unova region...
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2300_10: I’ll definitely give you a tour!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2400_10:
Anyway, Snivy and I have been keeping
on top of our acting skills so that we can
star in another movie someday.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2600_10:
When you break it all down, acting is
a lot like imitating other people.
You just do whatever they would do!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2700_10:
In other words, if I try to act just like
the Trainers I battle against...
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2800_10:
or just imitate lots of other Trainers
in general...
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2900_10:
maybe I can learn to do all sorts of
new things, too! Just like them!
The possibilities are endless!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_3000_10:
After all, if you want to act like someone else,
you have to put yourself in their shoes.
You learn how they think and how they battle.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0401_3200_10:
Yeah! We could try it out together
if you want, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0402_3400_10:
Yeah! We could try it out together
if you want, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_3500_10:
It’s OK if you’ve never acted before!
Snivy will be keeping an eye on you!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0401_3700_10:
Snivy’s got a great eye! She can tell
if you’re totally in character or not.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0402_3900_10:
Snivy’s got a great eye! She can tell
if you’re totally in character or not.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_4000_10:
See, your aura kinda changes when you
take on a role and you really
embody that character.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_4100_10:
And little Snivy here is ultra sensitive
to that sort of thing!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_4200_10:
I think it’s, like...one of those things that
only a Pokémon can truly sense, you know?
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_4300_10:
Snivy’s always on the lookout—even during
Pokémon battles! She watches her opponents
really carefully.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0401_4500_10: I know, right?! I think so, too!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0402_4700_10: I know, right?! I think so, too!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_4800_10: The next time we battle against you...
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_4900_10:
Snivy and I will have to study the way you
do things, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
So that we can imitate you someday!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_5000_10:
I’ll always be me in the end, though!
That’s never gonna change!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_5100_10:
I’ll study a bunch of Trainers and learn
what I can from imitating them, but I’m
not just gonna copy whatever they do.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_5200_10:
I’m gonna take all that new knowledge
and experience and use it to flavor
my OWN battle style! And I’m gonna win!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_1201_0100_10:
Mwahaha! ’Tis I, Brycen-Man!
I have waited an eternity for this
day to come, Snivy-Girl!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_1201_0200_10:
Huh?! Who are you?!
Wait, is that you, Brycen?
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_1201_0300_10:
Hm? You wish to do some intensive training
with your Snivy? Well then, I shall oblige!
Prepare to be defeated!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_1201_0400_10:
Wh-what’s going on?!
It’s like you’ve totally become the
character you play in the movies!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_0101_0100_10:
I knew this day would come!
I procured this Zoroark for that very purpose!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_0501_0100_10:
How? How did you manage to brush aside ME,
Brycen-Man, and my mighty Zoroark so easily?
I underestimated you, Snivy-Girl...
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_0501_0200_10:
Brycen, you don’t have to keep up the act
anymore! You came here to battle for Snivy
and my sake, didn’t you?
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_0501_0300_10:
I...I have no idea what you’re talking about!
F-farewell, Snivy-Girl!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_0501_0400_10:
Whoa! Snivy, are you about to evolve?!
I just felt this sudden rush of power!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_0501_0500_10:
This is amazing! Promise me we’ll always
be together, even after you evolve!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_1201_0100_10:
Rosa, I’m confident your Servine still has
plenty of room to grow. So come on!
Let’s battle it out and see what he can do!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_1201_0200_10:
Yes! Of course I’ll battle you!
You and Onix are as strong as rocks, 
though, so we’ll give it our best shot!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_1201_0300_10:
I’ve been wanting to fight in an all-out
one-on-one battle with you for a long time!
Come on—let’s do this!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0101_0100_10:
Just see if you can get past the impenetrable
wall of my rock-solid willpower and my
Onix’s rock-hard armor!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0101_0200_10:
Don’t hold back! Come at me with
everything you’ve got!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0501_0100_10:
Man! Your power smashed right through
our rock-solid defense!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0501_0200_10:
Thanks! I had so much fun battling
against you and Onix!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0501_0300_10:
It was fun for us, too.
We should do this again sometime.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0501_0400_10:
We did it, Servine! Brock was right—
I think you’re gonna continue to get
even stronger!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0501_0500_10:
Whoa! Hold on. Are you evolving?!
This is amazing! Promise me we’ll always
be together, even after you evolve!
